item.title: Cato Kusters’ ‘Julian’ Tells the Story of the Global State of Same-Sex Marriage Through the Eyes of One Couple — Watch Trailer
item.description: In Belgian filmmaker Cato Kusters’ new film “Julian,” a couple make a plan to commit a globetrotting feat of activism — before tragedy strikes. Drawn from Fleur Pierets’ memoir of the same name, “Juli
